lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, Sharon Tate... Jay Sebring... Voytek Frykowski... Abigail Folger... Steven Parent... Leno LaBianca... and Rosemary LaBianca are not here with us right now in this courtroom. But from their graves, they cry out for justice! And justice can only be served by you returning to this courtroom with a verdict of guilty.
"You beat a man with a whip... and he likes the whip... (laughs) you're just makin' a fool of yourself!"
Are you always this happy?
Uh-huh.
What's the secret?
We found the truth.
What's the truth?
Charlie is love.
Boots is no longer with us.
What do you mean, Boots is no longer with us?
He's among the dead. He shot himself the other night, playing Russian Roulette.
Oh, terrific. Who was with him?
Cisco Budge.
Cisco Budge. That's it. I ain't talking no more. I'm riding out of here on the wind, mister.
There are a couple of warrants outstanding against you, Danny. I don't think you'd feel very safe in prison. That's where Charlie is.

[slight pause]
That sure is cold, man.

"Please don't kill me. Please don't kill me. I don't wanna die. I wanna live. I wanna have my baby. I wanna have my baby." And I looked her straight in the eye and I said "Look, bitch. I don't care about you. I don't care about your baby. You better be ready. You're gonna die and I don't feel a thing about it." And then I proceeded to stab her, okay?
Okay.
And you know what? I just kept stabbing her and stabbing her 'til she stopped screaming.
But she was pregnant. Didn't it bother you to kill her?

No, I thought you understood. I LOVED her and in order for me to kill her I was killing part of myself when I killed her. In fact, Charlie gave us instructions to mutilate them. We were gonna cut out the baby if we had time.
I gotta go to the can.
Y-you know the other two? The next night?
Labiancas. Mm-hmm.
[Susan nods]
Well, what do you think?
[Ronnie shakes her head]

And there's more. Before, one guy we cut his head off and uh, three more out in the desert... and more besides. At least eleven. Eleven they'll never solve. And there's gonna be plenty more to come. We're gonna pick out some of the biggest pigs and execute them and release them from this Earth. You have to have a real love in your heart for people to do this for them, you know?
I gotta go to the can. I'll let you get some sleep.
[Ronnie leaves and starts to sob]
It ain't nice to snitch, Shorty.
MURDER! MURDER! MURDER!

[narrating]
It was so quiet, one of the killers would later say, you could almost hear the sound of ice rattling in cocktail shakers in the homes way down the canyon.

Good Evening, you're about to see a dramatization based on actual facts. We may not like to accept the fact that those in the story of Helter Skelter exist in our lives. Yet, they do. And while they do we can not say that the story of Helter Skelter has ended.
What's your name, honey?
Sadie. Sexy Sadie.
If I could I would jerk this microphone off and beat your brains out with it because that is what you deserve, that is what you deserve!
